title: Looking for a drinking buddy - ranked only!
body:
Hey all.

I want to get drunk tonight and play league. Its Friday night, I'm going to chill and have fun. To save my Elo I can duo with people on a bronze smurf account I don't care about - or we can duo on this one if you're higher elo.

I like to get drunk, talk shit, have fun and carry games. If you think I sound like someone fun you can play with you're damn right!

Reply to this thread AND add me in game - I'll be checking the thread over the next 5 hours looking for my duo queue partner for the night.

That's right, you could be bronze and I can smurf duo queue with you for some easy wins and fun times, just post below!

replies.body: M8 hit me up. you seem chill as.
